__e: A man was murdered in the attic of that house.
I was so full of myself, I thought that they could help some historian
I have a dead-end job, I live in my sister's attic, I basically never go out.
Our mother murdered our brother in the attic, and now she has murdered our sister as clearly as if she poured the poison down her throat.
He told me about the loft and he said other things as well.
I don't know what went on in that attic... and the truth is neither do you.
